title: Market Capitalization and Valuation Metrics of Western New England Bancorp Inc

content.text: As of a recent date, the market capitalization of Western New England Bancorp Inc is $XXX million.

Additionally, the price-to-sales (P/S) ratio of Western New England Bancorp Inc is XX, compared to the industry benchmark of XX. The price-to-book (P/B) ratio of the company is XX, while the industry benchmark is XX.

news.headline: Western New England Bancorp (WNEB) Soars 9.0%: Is Further Upside Left in the Stock?
news.summary: Western New England Bancorp (WNEB) saw its shares surge in the last session with trading volume being higher than average. The latest trend in earnings estimate revisions may not translate into further price increase in the near term.
